title: A Test of Baseball Cards
question_text:
Hank and Mickey both collected baseball cards. They wanted to know if the proportions of pitchers depicted on cards varied between the two major baseball card companies, Dopps and Upper Teck. So, they each ordered $500$ random baseball cards, Hank from Dopps and Mickey from Upper Teck.
To compare their proportions of pitchers using a test of significance for two proportions, what would their hypotheses be?
